name: AuthorizationFlags
desc: The flags used to specify authorization options.

items.name: static var interactionAllowed: AuthorizationFlags
items.desc: A flag that permits user interaction as needed.

items.name: static var extendRights: AuthorizationFlags
items.desc: A flag that permits the Security Server to attempt to grant the rights requested.

items.name: static var partialRights: AuthorizationFlags
items.desc: A flag that permits the Security Server to grant rights on an individual basis.

items.name: static var destroyRights: AuthorizationFlags
items.desc: A flag that instructs the Security Server to revoke authorization.

items.name: static var preAuthorize: AuthorizationFlags
items.desc: A flag that instructs the Security Server to preauthorize the rights requested.
